snippet: Chinese authorities ordained a bishop without Rome’s consent and detained another new bishop after he made a dramatic break with the government body that oversees Catholics in China.

byline.contributor: Mia Li and Jacob Fromer contributed research from Beijing, and Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: Chinese authorities ordained a bishop without Rome’s consent and detained another new bishop after he made a dramatic break with the government body that oversees Catholics in China.

headline.seo: Ordination of Bishops Increases Tensions Between China and Vatican
headline.main: Ordination of Bishops Increases Tensions Between China and Vatican
headline.print_headline: Ordination of Bishops Increases Tensions Between China and Vatican
